Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Wohin? from Die schöne Müllerin (Franz Schubert)

1925 · Threlfall and Norris III/10

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of Franz Schubert’s song Wohin? from the song cycle Die schöne Müllerin (D 795 no. 2), originally written for voice and piano.

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 5
